unnormalised: Land near Powai Lake up for grabs! Sources say a prime plot, approx. 2000 sq ft at Hiranandani Gardens, is hitting the market soon. Asking price? Rumors swirling around Rs. 8 Cr, maybe a bit more depending on the builder who snaps it up.
normalised: Land near Powai Lake up for grabs! Sources say a prime plot, approximately two thousand square feet at Hiranandani Gardens, is hitting the market soon. Asking price? Rumors swirling around rupee eight crore, maybe a bit more depending on the builder who snaps it up.

unnormalised: Apparently, some big names like Godrej Properties and Oberoi Realty are already eyeing the place. It's right behind Galleria Shopping Mall, so location-wise, it's a total win. The address is rumored to be near the intersection of Orchard Ave and Central Ave.
normalised: Apparently, some big names like G-o-d-r-e-j Properties and Oberoi Realty are already eyeing the place. It's right behind Galleria Shopping Mall, so location-wise, it's a total win. The address is rumored to be near the intersection of Orchard Avenue and Central Avenue.

unnormalised: Think about it – that’s a pretty sweet spot. Easy access to JVLR, close to the airport, and you’re basically living in Powai, one of the most happening places in Mumbai. Pin code’s gotta be around 400076, give or take.
normalised: Think about it – that’s a pretty sweet spot. Easy access to J-V-L-R, close to the airport, and you’re basically living in Powai, one of the most happening places in Mumbai. Pin code’s gotta be around four hundred thousand and seventy six, give or take.

unnormalised: Real estate experts are saying this could set a new benchmark for property values in the area. Remember that other plot that went for Rs 3.5 Cr per 1000 sq ft last year? This one could easily cross Rs 4 Cr, they reckon.
normalised: Real estate experts are saying this could set a new benchmark for property values in the area. Remember that other plot that went for rupee three point five crore per one thousand square feet last year? This one could easily cross rupee four crore, they reckon.

unnormalised: Watch this space! We’ll keep you updated with the final price and who ends up bagging this prime piece of Powai real estate. Exciting times for the Mumbai property market! Contact your broker and check if units near 7/8, MHADA Colony are available!
